Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Elder Dave Vreeken
Sister Kathy Vreeken

17151 SE Petrovitsky Rd.
Renton, WA 98058

Cell (Dave): (208) 715-7416

Cell (Kathy): (425)255-0715

 

Seattle@byui.edu

Learn more about Seattle »

Dave and Kathy Vreeken grew up in Southern California in the San Fernando Valley. Both members of the Encino Ward and attended all the same schools, just not at the same time. They were sealed in the LA Temple on May 5, 1979. They have three sons and one daughter and 6 grandchildren.

Dave served 1975-1979 in the Kentucky, Louisville Mission. Together they have served two missions for LDS Family Services, as Group Leaders for the Addiction Recovery Program and Family Support Group. They are both currently serving as Ordinance Workers at the Seattle Temple. Dave is serving as the Men’s Shift Coordinator. Kathy was serving as the temples clothing issue coordinator.

Dave has served as Nursery Leader, Executive Secretary, Scout Master, YM President, Elders Quorum President, Varsity Coach, 2nd Counselor in Bishopric, Seminary Teacher, High Council, High Adventure Leader, Bishop, Stake YM Presidency, Currently serving as the High Priest Group Leader. Kathy has served as Nursery Leader, Stake Nursery Leader, Primary President, VT Coordinator, RS Secretary, YW Presidency, YW Advisor, and currently as RS Meeting coordinator. They love working together so serving as service missionaries if their favorite.

Dave and Kathy moved from Southern CA to the Seattle area in 1986 to start their business, which they sold in 2006 to Premium Brands. Dave went on to work for the company as the Senior Sales Manager for the State of Alaska and Kathy retired. Prior to that Kathy was a Medical Assistant and Dave worked for Arrowhead Water company. They love the outdoors and have 5 quads, a boat and lots of fun toys to keep the grandkids and everyone happy.
